author: Simon Difford
description: Rinse chilled glass with sherry and set aside. STIR other ingredients with ice and fine strain into pre-rinsed glass.
name: Full Circle (by Ryan Mowat)

STIR other ingredients with ice and fine strain into pre-rinsed glass
